Title: ProdSpy
Description:
ProdSpy is an investigation tool provided to assist in the use of ProdUI. It provides for gathering information about a control and its containing window. It is designed to be familiar to those who have used Spy++ or similar tools.
Part of the ProdUI package.
Please go to the ProdUI project site for discussion and more complete information
http://produi.codeplex.com
HomeWiki:
ProdSpy

Summary

ProdSpy is an investigation tool provided to assist in the use of ProdUI. It provides for gathering information about a control and its containing window. It is designed to be familiar to those who have used Spy++ or similar tools.

It is part of a larger suite called ProdUI, which handles automating windows controls. The ProdUI project can be found Here.

Source code is maintained on a Google Code  project, though releases will be handled through CodePlex.

New Release!

.0.8.4 has been released. Head to the download page to grab it.
